author: Digital Desk
title: Heavy Rain Lashes Tamil Nadu’s Thoothukudi, Waterlogging in Several Areas- Republic World
text: Updated March 22nd, 2024 at 06:54 IST Heavy Rain Lashes Tamil Nadu’s Thoothukudi, Waterlogging in Several Areas News agency ANI shared the visuals from Thoothukudi where waterlogged roads can be seen. [India](https://www.republicworld.com/india) - 1 min read [Digital Desk](/anchors-and-authors/digital-desk/) Advertisement Chennai: Heavy rain lashed various parts of Thoothukudi in Tamil Nadu early on Friday morning, with commuters facing difficulties. News agency ANI shared the rain visuals of Thoothukudi where waterlogged roads can be seen. Advertisement The weather department has predicted rain at one or two place in the state for the next few days. Advertisement Meanwhile, IMD had also predicted that rainfall activity will intensify along with the thunderstorm over Northeast India and Sub-Himalayan West Bengal & Sikkim during March 21 to 26 period. Advertisement Published March 22nd, 2024 at 06:54 IST Your Voice. Now Direct. Send us your views, we’ll publish them. This section is moderated. Advertisement Recommended [India News](https://www.republicworld.com/india)9 hours ago
